Reviewed 7 of 7 files at r1.
Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved, some commit checks failed.

---

*[src/core/ext/filters/client_channel/lb_policy/grpclb/grpclb_client_stats.cc, line 68 at r1](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15436#-LCoWkUA74Y0bgYmEMzH:-LCoWkUBAGMxKABrR-4O:b-4rx15) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/290d35e1d2418ade8232d00d5303a7bb256fcb44/src/core/ext/filters/client_channel/lb_policy/grpclb/grpclb_client_stats.cc#L68)):*
> ```cpp
> void AtomicGetAndResetCounter(int64_t* value, gpr_atm* counter) {
>   *value = static_cast<int64_t>(gpr_atm_acq_load(counter));
>   gpr_atm_full_fetch_add(counter, (gpr_atm)(-*value));
> ```

Unrelated question: why don't we just reset the counter to 0?

---


*Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15436#-:-LCoZ-pW5y48Xaw1IC_J:b-85i63v)*

Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion, some commit checks failed. --- *[src/core/ext/filters/client_channel/lb_policy/grpclb/grpclb_client_stats.cc, line 68 at r1](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15436#-LCoWkUA74Y0bgYmEMzH:-LCoeOt56joDhL9i-32E:b-nl6o6h) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/290d35e1d2418ade8232d00d5303a7bb256fcb44/src/core/ext/filters/client_channel/lb_policy/grpclb/grpclb_client_stats.cc#L68)):*
Previously, AspirinSJL (Juanli Shen) wrote…
Unrelated question: why don't we just reset the counter to 0?
There may be another call updating these stats at the same time that we are grabbing the existing count for the load report. When that happens, we don't want to zero out anything that was added between the call to `gpr_atm_acq_load()` and when we reset the counter, so instead we just subtract the amount we just grabbed. That having been said, this comment made me take another look at the atm API, and it looks like we can instead use `gpr_atm_full_xchg()` to do this in a single step, so I've gone ahead and made that change. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15436)*
